title: New Report from Rep. Garamendi and Sen. Warren Reveals Trump Admin. Took $2 Billion from Military for Immigration Enforcement | Congressman John Garamendi
snippet: WASHINGTON, DC — Representative John Garamendi (D-CA-08) and U.S. Senator Elizabeth Warren (D-MA) released a new report detailing the Trump administration’s diversion of funds and resources from the Department of Defense (DoD) to the Department of Homeland Security (DHS) for immigration enforcement, and its impact on readiness and morale.
